name: Captivate Designs, Inc.
description:
Captivate Designs, Inc., is a web design and digital marketing company that helps small businesses throughout the U.S., Canada and the U.K establish a professional online presence and leverage the internet to generate more leads and sales.
We offer our clients a range of services to help them succeed online, including:
Custom Web Design
Search Engine Optimization
Pay Per Click Marketing
Graphic Design
Private and In-house SEO Training
Our clients have come to rely on us as a trusted partner and valuable member of their team.
READ MORE...
